trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The leucrotta has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Kicking Retreat
entries: If the leucrotta attacks with its hooves, it can take the Disengage action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The leucrotta can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom (Insight) check.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the leucrotta reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, it can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make an attack with its hooves.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The leucrotta makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its hooves.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage. If the leucrotta scores a critical hit, it rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.
